name: Domain of Mastery: Frosted Altar IV
description: Massive Cryo energy is coursing through this freezing ancient sacrificial altar.\nThe bone-piercing cold even makes traversal difficult.\nYou shall earn Talent level-up materials, if — and only if — you can pass the trial.
disorder: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Condensed Ice, greatly increasing your Stamina Consumption until the inflicted Cryo element is removed. Icicles will periodically fall from above, dealing Cryo DMG.
